title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 349-1.1 - Therapy treatment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 349-1.1 - Therapy treatment

State Regulations

Treatment shall be rendered by a duly licensed therapist, upon prescription or referral which may be directive as to treatment of an
authorized physician or in the case of physical therapy, authorized physician
or authorized podiatrist. Treatment by a licensed therapist shall be within the
scope of such therapist's specialized training and qualifications as defined in
articles 136 and 156 of the Education Law. Prescription or referral by the
authorized physician or in the case of physical therapy, authorized physician
or authorized podiatrist, including directions as to treatment, if any, shall
constitute a part of the record of the case. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
349-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
